items.title: N.I.N.A
items.content: NIGHTTIME IMAGING 'N' ASTRONOMY - An astrophotography imaging suite

items.title: APT
items.content: Can control DSLR & CMOS camera,includes image acquisition tools,Now ToupTek Astro Camera is fully compatible with this software

items.title: MaximDL
items.content: MaxIm DL is the complete integrated solution for all of your astronomical imaging needs.

items.title: MaximDL 汉化
items.content: MaxIm DL is the complete integrated solution for all of your astronomical imaging needs.

items.title: THESky
items.content: An essential tool for astronomical discovery and observation.

items.title: Voyager
items.content: A systems integration software, interfacing third-part software products.

items.title: SGP
items.content: The best in class automation software for astrophotography.

items.title: Kstars/Ekos
items.content: KStars has an extensive set of features that enhance your visual observation workflow.

items.title: CCDCiel
items.content: A CCD capture software intended for the amateur astronomer.

items.title: SharpCap
items.content: SharpCap is an easy-to-use and powerful astronomy camera capture tool. It supports a wide range of dedicated astronomy cameras as well as webcams and USB frame grabbers.

items.title: FireCapture
items.content: Can control Telescope, EFW, has Autoguiding and Autorun features, Now ToupTek Astro Camera is fully compatible with this software

items.title: OaCpature
items.content: oaCapture is a planetary imaging application for Linux and MacOS.

items.title: ToupSky
items.content: ToupTek官方天文软件平台，包含行星拍摄、深空拍摄、实时叠加以及实用的天文图像处理工具。

items.title: ASIStudio
items.content: 一站式天文摄影软件.集成多款天文摄影必备软件，跨平台支持.简单易用的一站式天文摄影软件

items.title: Lucky Stack Worker
items.content: LuckyStackWorker is a desktop application that aims to simplify and speed up post-processing of planetary,,

items.title: PHD2
items.content: PHD2 is telescope guiding software that simplifies the process of tracking a guide star, letting you concentrate on other aspects of deep-sky imaging or spectroscopy.

items.title: LinGuider
items.content: Lin-guider is an astronomical autoguiding program for Linux.

items.title: ASTAP
items.content: astrometric (plate) solver, stacking of images, photometry and FITS viewer

items.title: Astrometry
items.content: Input an image and we'll give you back astrometric calibration meta-data, plus lists of known objects falling inside the field of view.

items.title: Astrometry(Ansvr)
items.content: ansvr is plate solving software that works just like the nova.astrometry.net online plate solving service, but uses an instance of the Astrometry.net plate solver on your Windows PC, no internet connection required.

items.title: StellarSolver
items.content: The Cross Platform SEP-based Star Extractor and Astrometry.net-Based Internal Astrometric Solver

items.title: PlateSolve2
items.content: PlateSolve2 is a standalone executable which can be downloaded from Planewave's PlateSolve2 downloads page. It requires the download of at least one catalogue of stars so it can properly work.

items.title: PlateSolve3
items.content: PlateSolve3 is a standalone executable which has been improved to work with longer focal lengths and smaller FOVs with fewer stars.

items.title: All Sky Platesolver
items.content: All Sky Plate Solver is a free software, designed to automatically detect the celestial coordinates of FITS and JPEG files captured by your ccd camera / reflex.

items.title: ASCOM
items.content: ASCOM is a consortium of astronomy software developers, vendors, and users.

items.title: ASCOMRemote
items.content: The ASCOM REST based Remote Driver Server and Remote Access Clients

items.title: INDI
items.content: INDI Library is an open source software to control astronomical equipment. It is based on the Instrument Neutral Distributed Interface (INDI) protocol and acts as a bridge between software clients and hardware devices.

items.title: INDIGO
items.content: INDIGO is a universal control software for professional and hobbyist astronomy. It is designed to be used with a wide range of devices, including cameras, telescopes, mounts, and other control devices.

items.title: 振旺
items.content: 让天文变得简单和有趣！提供一站式天文观星、摄影解决方案，从硬件、软件、运营全面布局，助力天文爱好者圆梦

items.title: QHYCCD
items.content: QHYCCD以领先的芯片调校技术、制冷技术、密封技术，以及备受用户信赖的硬件稳定性而著称于业界

items.title: 图谱天文
items.content: 图谱天文热忱追求创新，不断探索天文摄影解决方案的新可能性和进展

items.title: 头号玩家
items.content: 走出家门，仰望苍穹！

items.title: Stellarium
items.content: Stellarium 是一款开源的天象模拟软件。它以3D形式展示了极为逼真的星空，就像你在真实世界使用裸眼，双筒望远镜或天文望远镜看到的一样。

items.title: SkyChart
items.content: SkyChart is a software to draw chart of the night sky for the amateur astronomer from a bunch of stars and nebulae catalogs.

items.title: INDIWeb
items.content: INDI Web Manager is a simple Web Application to manage: INDI server and INID drivers

items.title: INDIWebManager
items.content: A Graphical program to Manage, Configure, Launch, and Monitor an INDI WebManager on OS X and Linux

items.title: GPredict
items.content: Gpredict is a real-time satellite tracking and orbit prediction application.

items.title: HNSKY
items.content: This program can control your telescope via the ASCOM or INDI interface

items.title: INDI starter
items.content: Indistarter is a user interface to run a INDI server.

items.title: EqmodGui
items.content: Eqmodgui is a user interface for Linux INDI Eqmod telescope driver.

items.title: AvisFV (Fits Viewer) 3.0
items.content: AvisFV is a FITS viewer for Windows 11, 10, 8, 7, XP (compatible also with most Linux and Mac if WINE is installed).

items.title: PixInsight
items.content: PixInsight is an advanced image processing software platform. It has been designed specifically for astrophotography and other technical imaging fields.

items.title: PixInsightLE
items.content: This is PixInsight Limited Edition (LE), a freeware subset of PixInsight Standard. PixInsight LE allows you to perform some basic image processing and is also an introductory preview to the full standard edition.

items.title: Astra Image
items.content: Astra Image will help you to make your photos look amazing!

items.title: Siril
items.content: Siril is an astronomical image processing tool

items.title: DeepSkyStacker
items.content: DeepSkyStacker is a freeware for astrophotographers that simplifies all the pre-processing steps of deep sky pictures.

items.title: FitsWork
items.content: Fitswork is a windows image processing program, mainly designed for astronomic purposes.

items.title: Registar
items.content: RegiStar is a toolkit for deep-sky imagers.

items.title: Nebulosity4
items.content: Simple, but powerful

items.title: Regim
items.content: Regim ist mein Werkzeug, das die Verarbeitung von astronomischen Aufnahmen erleichtert.

items.title: RawTherapee
items.content: RawTherapee is a free, cross-platform raw image processing program

items.title: CCDStack
items.content: Powerful, easy-to-use astronomical image processing software with next-generation technology.

items.title: GraXpert
items.content: GraXpert is designed to remove gradients from astroimages. As the name suggests, gradients are gradual changes in brightness that are not part of the astrophoto but are caused by external interference.

items.title: AutoStacker
items.content: AutoStakkert!4 Stacking Software – Lucky Imaging with an Edge

items.title: Registax
items.content: Free image processing software

items.title: WinJupos
items.content: Free image processing software

items.title: PIPP
items.content: PIPP's main purpose is to crop each image frame and select only the best quality frames to reduce the memory and processing requirements of the stacking software.

items.title: PTGui
items.content: PTGui is panoramic image stitching software for Windows, macOS and Linux.

items.title: Startrails
items.content: A freeware for Windows to create startrail-images and timelapse movies

items.title: Startrails 汉化
items.content: A freeware for Windows to create startrail-images and timelapse movies

items.title: Sequator
items.content: Sequator is a free software which can track stars on multiple images, align stars and stack them.

items.title: Heilicon
items.content: The digital revolution of the last few years made professional photo hardware widely available and affordable.
